title: Potential security breach
content:
Hi all,

I recently used Pixel's support chat regarding an issue with blocking outgoing SMSs. The rep assigned to me wasn't very helpful. I signed off the chat with "You have been extremely unhelpful. Bye."

Five minutes later, I get an email in my inbox from an unknown email address saying "Hey you piece of shit. I'm coming for you." It could be a coincidence, but there's a reasonable chance that it's the same fellow.

Does anyone know the kind of access provided to the chat support staff? And, how do I reach out to someone who works at Google with this info? I have the pseudonym used by the rep while chatting with me and the email address that sent this mail.

Best,
Amrit
